events.name: click
events.description: Emitted when user clicks/taps on the main button (not the icon one, if using 'split')
events.description_zh: 当用户单击/点击主按钮时发出（如果使用 'split'，则不是图标按钮）

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 在显示/隐藏状态更改时触发;也被 v-model 使用

v-model.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 定义显示/隐藏状态的组件模型;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令

split.description: Split dropdown icon into its own button
split.description_zh: 将下拉图标拆分为自己的按钮

disable-main-btn.description: Disable main button (useful along with 'split' prop)
disable-main-btn.description_zh: 禁用主按钮（与 'split' 属性一起有用）

disable-dropdown.description: Disables dropdown (dropdown button if using along 'split' prop)
disable-dropdown.description_zh: 禁用下拉列表（如果与 'split' prop 一起使用，则为下拉按钮）

no-icon-animation.description: Disables the rotation of the dropdown icon when state is toggled
no-icon-animation.description_zh: 在切换状态时禁用下拉图标的旋转

content-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the menu
content-style.description_zh: 要归属于菜单的样式定义

content-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the menu
content-class.description_zh: 要归属于菜单的类定义

cover.description: Allows the menu to cover the button. When used, the 'menu-self' and 'menu-fit' props are no longer effective
cover.description_zh: 允许菜单覆盖按钮。使用时，'menu-self' 和 'menu-fit' props 不再有效

persistent.description: Allows the menu to not be dismissed by a click/tap outside of the menu or by hitting the ESC key; Also, an app route change won't dismiss it
persistent.description_zh: 允许不通过单击/点击菜单外部或按 ESC 键来关闭菜单;此外，应用程序路线更改不会关闭它

no-route-dismiss.description: Changing route app won't dismiss the popup; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set
no-route-dismiss.description_zh: 更改路线应用程序不会关闭弹出窗口;如果还设置了 'persistent' prop，则无需设置它

auto-close.description: Allows any click/tap in the menu to close it; Useful instead of attaching events to each menu item that should close the menu on click/tap
auto-close.description_zh: 允许单击/点击菜单中的任何按钮来关闭它;有用的，而不是将事件附加到每个菜单项，这些菜单项应在单击/点击时关闭菜单

menu-anchor.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
menu-anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the menu relative to its target
menu-anchor.description_zh: 两个值设置菜单相对于其目标的起始位置或锚点

menu-self.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
menu-self.description: Two values setting the menu's own position relative to its target
menu-self.description_zh: 两个值设置菜单相对于其目标的位置

menu-offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the menu horizontally and vertically in pixels
menu-offset.description_zh: 一个包含两个数字的数组，用于水平和垂直偏移菜单（以像素为单位）

toggle-aria-label.description: aria-label to be used on the dropdown toggle element
toggle-aria-label.description_zh: aria-label 用于下拉切换元素

type.description: 1) Define the button native type attribute (submit, reset, button) or 2) render component with <a> tag so you can access events even if disable or 3) Use 'href' prop and specify 'type' as a media tag
type.description_zh: 1） 定义按钮原生类型属性（submit、reset、button）或 2） 使用标签渲染组件<a>，这样即使禁用也可以访问事件，或者 3） 使用 'href' 属性并指定 'type' 作为媒体标签

to.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used
to.description_zh: 等同于 Vue Router <router-link> 的 'to' 属性;如果使用，则被 'href' prop 取代

replace.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used
replace.description_zh: 相当于 Vue Router <router-link> 的 'replace' 属性;如果使用，则被 'href' prop 取代

href.description: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to' and 'replace' props
href.description_zh: 原生<a>链接 href 属性;优先于 'to' 和 'replace' 属性

target.description: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only with 'to' or 'href' props
target.description_zh: Native <a> link 目标属性;仅将其与 'to' 或 'href' 属性一起使用

label.description: The text that will be shown on the button

rounded.description: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button
rounded.description_zh: 为方形按钮应用更突出的边框半径

fab.description: Makes button size and shape to fit a Floating Action Button
fab.description_zh: 使按钮的大小和形状适合浮动操作按钮

fab-mini.description: Makes button size and shape to fit a small Floating Action Button
fab-mini.description_zh: 使按钮的大小和形状适合小型浮动操作按钮

padding.description: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set
padding.description_zh: 应用自定义内边距 （垂直 [水平]）;以 CSS 单位表示的大小，包括单元名称或标准大小名称 （none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl）;设置时还会删除最小宽度和高度

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: The color used to color the separator, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

no-caps.description: Avoid turning label text into caps (which happens by default)
no-caps.description_zh: 避免将标签文本转换为大写字母（默认情况下会发生这种情况）

align.type: left / right / center / around / between / evenly

stack.description: Stack icon and label vertically instead of on same line (like it is by default)
stack.description_zh: 垂直堆叠图标和标签，而不是在同一行上（就像默认情况下一样）

stretch.description: When used on flexbox parent, button will stretch to parent's height
stretch.description_zh: 在 flexbox 父级上使用时，按钮将拉伸到父级的高度

loading.description: Put button into loading state (displays a QSpinner -- can be overridden by using a 'loading' slot)
loading.description_zh: 将按钮置于加载状态（显示 QSpinner -- 可以使用“加载”插槽覆盖）

transition-duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）

slots.name: label
slots.description: Customize main button's content through this slot, unless you're using the 'icon' and 'label' props
slots.description_zh: 通过此插槽自定义主按钮的内容，除非您使用 'icon' 和 'label' 属性

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Override the default QSpinner when in 'loading' state
slots.description_zh: 在 'loading' 状态下覆盖默认的 QSpinner
